greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Related to the minimal number of periodic orbits of periods guaranteed by Sharkovskii's theorem.
comment: Bau-Sen Du's [1985/2007] Table 1, p. 6, has this sequence as the 6th column, denoted A_{n,5}.
link: Bau-Sen Du, The Minimal Number of Periodic Orbits of Periods Guaranteed in Sharkovskii's Theorem, arXiv:0706.2297 [math.DS], 2007; Bull. Austral. Math. Soc. 31(1985), 89-103. Corrigendum: 32 (1985), 159.
mathematica: MT[phin[5]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 06 2018, adapted from _Max Alekseyev_'s PARI script *)
program: (PARI) \\ implementation of MT() and phin() is given in A006207
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Jun 18 2007
ext: Terms a(32) onward from _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 23 2012
